version_description:
Improved text boxes:
- Set an adjustable, fixed width to text boxes for easier typing and text wrapping

Advanced custom color picker
- Pick a custom color from anywhere on your photos, videos or template for backgrounds and fonts!

Minor bug fixes and improvements
- Improved resolution on exports
- Resolved minor UI bugs throughout
- Improved brush performance

Improved text boxes:
- Set an adjustable, fixed width to text boxes for easier typing and text wrapping

Advanced custom color picker
- Pick a custom color from anywhere on your photos, videos or template for backgrounds and fonts!

Minor bug fixes and improvements
- Improved resolution on exports
- Resolved minor UI bugs throughout
- Improved brush performance

Improved text boxes:
- Set an adjustable, fixed width to text boxes for easier typing and text wrapping

Advanced custom color picker
- Pick a custom color from anywhere on your photos, videos or template for backgrounds and fonts!

Minor bug fixes and improvements
- Improved resolution on exports
- Resolved minor UI bugs throughout
- Improved brush performance

Improved text boxes:
- Set an adjustable, fixed width to text boxes for easier typing and text wrapping

Advanced custom color picker
- Pick a custom color from anywhere on your photos, videos or template for backgrounds and fonts!

Minor bug fixes and improvements
- Improved resolution on exports
- Resolved minor UI bugs throughout
- Improved brush performance

Introducing 4x5 gallery options!
• You can now decide if you want to create a gallery template in 1x1 or 4x5. Currently available with Classic and Analog. More packs coming soon!

Bug fixes and optimizations
• Resolved an issue with iCloud videos not being imported into templates

Thank you all for your support!

Introducing 4x5 gallery options!
• You can now decide if you want to create a gallery template in 1x1 or 4x5. Currently available with Classic and Analog. More packs coming soon!

Bug fixes and optimizations
• Resolved an issue with iCloud videos not being imported into templates

Thank you all for your support!

Introducing 4x5 gallery options!
• You can now decide if you want to create a gallery template in 1x1 or 4x5. Currently available with Classic and Analog. More packs coming soon!

Bug fixes and optimizations
• Resolved an issue with iCloud videos not being imported into templates

Thank you all for your support!

Introducing 4x5 gallery options!
• You can now decide if you want to create a gallery template in 1x1 or 4x5. Currently available with Classic and Analog. More packs coming soon!

Bug fixes and optimizations
• Resolved an issue with iCloud videos not being imported into templates

Thank you all for your support!

New Texture Backgrounds!
• Add new textures to the background of any template!
• Scale, rotate, and move around the background just like an image

Thank you for all of the support!

NEW Stickers & Gifs!
- Add fun stickers to any template!
- Choose from 3 different packs: Label, Tape, & Holo. More packs to come!
- Add a gif to your template by selecting from Giphy's library

Thank you so much for you support!

Introducing Template 2.0!
- NEW! Animated templates add movement to your content! Available in both story and feed sizes.
- Updated menu navigation for better user experience
- Switch between dark mode and light mode in the new expanding menu on the home screen
- Download the app and get access to 10 FREE limited time only templates! Find them in the Basics tag.
